Translations.Text: Iyara pichato yara prati iccha allahe tara ta'oba kabula karaiba; arau allaha ati ksamasila, parama dayalu

He imandarasakala! Niscaya musbaraikasakala aparaitra, gatike e'i bacharara pichata sihamte yate machajidula haraamara nikatararti nahaya; arau yadi tomaloke daraidratara asanka karaa tente allahe iccha karaile te'omra nija anugrahata tomalokaka abharamukta karaiba. Niscaya allaha mahajnani, prajnamaya

Yisakalaka kitaba pradana karaa haiche sihamtara majata yisakale allahara prati bisbasa nakarae arau sesa dirasara prati'o imana posana nakarae lagate allaha arau te'omra raachule yi haraama karaiche seya haraama buli ganya nakarae; arau satya dbinara anusarana nakarae; sihamte nata hai nija hate jiya'iya nidiya laike sihamtara lagata yud'dha karaa

Arau iyahudisakale kaya, ‘uya'ira allahara putra’, arau khraistanasakale kaya, ‘machiha allahara putra’. E'ito kerala sihamtara mukhara katha. Purbe yisakale kupharai karaichila sihamtara darae'i ihamte katha kaya. Allahe ihamtaka dhbansa karaka. Kona pine ihamtaka ubhata'i niya haiche

sihamte allahara bahirae sihamtara pandita arau sansara-biraagisakalaka sihamtara rabaraupe grahana karaiche arau mara'iyamara putra machihako. Athaca eka ilahara ibadata karaara babe'i te'omloka adista haichila. Yara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i. Sihamte yi ansi sthapana karae tara paraa te'om ati paraitra
